title: Conscient
description: Vibe coded the frontend using Lovable
Built an AI Chat bot using Grok AI
Trained the AI using matplotlib.pyplot and Natural Language Processing

title: Polaris
description: Used Mappedin API and essential web technologies to develop a fully functional event navigation platform
Used Third-party Node.js modules and the Voiceflow API to integrate an AI chatbot
Used MongoDB Atlas to deploy the database for the project

title: Multi Knives
description: Used C#, Photoshop and Audacity to develop a fully functional mobile game, inspired by the game 'Knife Hit'
Learned core programming concepts like OOPs and functionalities of Unity Game Engine
Used Photoshop to develop the sprites and Audacity to record and edit the sounds from scratch
